verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When the sky was starless In the void of the night. Our God is an awesome God. He spoke into the darkness And created the light. Our God is an awesome God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Our God is an awesome God He reigns from heaven above With wisdom, power and love Our God is an awesome God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He created the bride From within Himself. Our God is an awesome God. She received her birth At the cross of Christ. Our God is an awesome God.{/lang-eng}
